price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ߬ߓߊ ߘߊ߲߫ ߝߋ߲ ߓߍ߯ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߛߴߊߟߎ߫ ߘߴߊߟߎ߫ ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߫
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
